mapper.select: select symbol, stock_name, chg, last_trade from stock_info where symbol = #{symbol} order by stock_date DESC limit 0, 1
mapper.insert: insert into trade_in(user_id, symbol, count, buy_amount) values(#{userId}, #{symbol}, #{stockNum}, #{stockAmount})
insert into trade_out(user_id, symbol, count, selling_amount) values(#{userId}, #{symbol}, #{stockNum}, #{stockAmount})
insert into user_stock_follow(user_id, symbol) values(#{userId}, #{symbol}) on duplicate key update status = 1
mapper.select: select symbol from user_stock_follow where symbol = #{symbol} and user_id = #{userId} and status = 1
mapper.update: update user_stock_follow set status = 0 where user_id = #{userId} and symbol = #{symbol}
